name: Super Diagonal 45
description:
You have been sent to the land of Ghostzone after your death. You do not want to be there, so you go on a quest to escape. You may just be a frail ghost, but you do have the handy abilty to jump at a perfect 45 degree angle. 

Go! Go! Diagonal Ghost!

This game was made in 3 weeks for a school project. For this reason it lacks a proper ending, as well as any sound.
